pkgmetadata.longdescription: # vWelcome to v - essential tools for programming in Python!## InstallationLinux / macOS (python3):```shpython3 -m pip install v```Linux / macOS (python2):``` shpython -m pip install v```Windows:``` shpy -m pip install v```[full guide](https://github.com/dylanopen/v/blob/main/docs/installation.md)## Docs[v documentation](https://github.com/dylanopen/v/tree/main/docs)## Changelog[v changelog](https://github.com/dylanopen/v/blob/main/changelog.txt)
